attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the news that Guinness "may work as well as an aspirin to prevent heart clots that raise the risk of heart attacks" (University of Wisconsin research), we the undersigned petition the PM to allow the NHS to prescribe Guinness to everybody who wants it as a public health measure with obvious economic and health benefits to the nation as a whole. Stout has been available on prescription in the past and should be available again.

reasons: Commercial endorsement, promotion of any product, service or publication, or statements that amount to adverts
